00001 package liquibase.ant;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.diff.DiffResult;
00005 
00006 import java.io.PrintStream;
00007 
00008 public class DiffDatabaseToChangeLogTask extends DiffDatabaseTask {
00009     protected void outputDiff(PrintStream writer, DiffResult diffResult, Database targetDatabase) throws Exception {
00010         diffResult.printChangeLog(writer, targetDatabase);
00011     }
00012 }
